name: Bug Bite
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world, you must survive! To obtain food for you and your starving daughter, you must exterminate the giant bugs around your house with your magical returning spear. Kill all the enemies and make it back home before the timer runs out!

Controls:

  • A and D for movement
  • Space for jump
  • Left mouse click to throw spear
  • Hold left mouse to recall spear
